title: Broken Heart Emoji

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:pink:1106716301843497030> ):
fields.value: The next time any card or any message in game chat can be reasonably related to love, hearts, happiness, or <:partisan:1107460550268559380>, you may instead take the effect(s) of the next card they play and use it on anyone in the game. This is a private status.

desc:
Post 1578
- This card shows up as a different <:red:1106234051129507932> card.
- Unflipped: The next time someone plays or says something love-based to you, you may instead take the effect(s) of the next card they play and use it back on them or yourself. This is a private status.
